EmailTemplate.name: 9/26/2013 - License to chill webinar.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Control Your Virtual Infrastructure and Get Your License to Chill
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
If you missed the opportunity to see VMTurbo in action at VMworld 2013, register here <http://bit.ly/18St1yQ> to join VMTurbo technical experts, Jonathan Reeve and Oved Lourie for this 45 minute webinar and product demonstration, where you will learn:
1) How to drive up utilization in your virtual environment while maintaining performance to your applications 2) How VMTurbo Operations Manager goes beyond alerting and monitoring alone and can automatically perform the actions it prescribes—preventing contention and problems from occurring
Your License to Chill: By reducing the complexity of managing virtualized IT, you can relax and focus on the other aspects of your job—with full confidence that your data center is operating in the desired state.
Kind Regards,
The VMTurbo Team
